If \\( h(x) \\) is executed on the initial state \\( x_0 \\) at t = 0, and then the system is allowed to evolve under the differential equation \\( \\dot{x} = Ax \\) without any further intervention, will the state of the system \\( x(t) \\) at a later time t = T be influenced by the transformation imposed by \\( D \\)?
Explanation: The initial application of \\( h(x) \\) modifies the original state vector, \\( x_0 \\), to \\( e^{D0}x_0 = x_0 \\).
